segments.text: Yes ? What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just checked in , and there's a problem with my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I asked for a non-smoking room , and I don't have one.My room smells like cigarette smoke . I can't stand it.Could you change my room , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see ... I'm sorry , but we don't have any more non-smoking rooms.We won't charge you for your room tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's OK . Thanks for your help .
segments.speaker: S1
